projects.title: HealthHub
projects.subtitle: Healthcare provider discovery and medical literacy web application

expanded.description: HealthHub is a healthcare-focused web application designed to improve access to medical providers and health information by presenting complex data through a clean, intuitive interface. The platform allows users to search for providers by specialty, explore results on an interactive map, and better understand healthcare options through clear, accessible content.
expanded.role: HealthHub was developed as a team project with 13 contributors. I led and owned the majority of the applicationâ€™s development, including site design, frontend implementation, API integration, client-side filtering logic, and completion of the interactive map feature. I was responsible for translating project requirements into a cohesive, functional prototype.
highlights: Integrated external healthcare APIs to retrieve and process provider data
Implemented client-side filtering logic to efficiently handle large datasets
Designed and completed an interactive provider map with expandable result cards
Focused on clarity, accessibility, and usability for diverse user populations
Structured frontend code for maintainability and future expansion
expanded.outcome: HealthHub was delivered as a fully functional prototype for a humanitarian engineering course. The project demonstrates my ability to take ownership of a complex web application, handle real-world data, and balance technical problem-solving with thoughtful user experience design.

expanded.description: As a Front-End Web Development Intern at Bath & Body Works, I worked on consumer-facing, production web pages supporting a high-traffic e-commerce platform. This experience exposed me to enterprise-scale frontend development, structured content workflows, and accessibility-conscious UI updates in a real production environment.
highlights: Implemented accessibility and usability improvements across production pages
Modified existing components within established design and content systems
Worked with Salesforce-integrated content and structured data
Identified and resolved UI issues affecting responsiveness and consistency
Contributed code that was deployed to live production environments

expanded.description: This project involved developing a Unix shell in C that supports command execution, signal handling, and command history management. The shell was designed to closely reflect real operating system behavior, strengthening my understanding of low-level system interactions.

This project involved designing and implementing a relational database and backend integration for an equipment rental company serving a specialized community, with equipment delivery handled via drones. The system was built to support structured data storage, efficient querying, and backend API usage.
highlights: Designed normalized relational schema using MySQL
Implemented primary and foreign key relationships
Created indexes to improve query performance
Wrote complex SQL queries using joins, aggregations, and constraints
